A0: Millions of offices around the world
RelatedSentence: Millions of offices around the world will this morning be filled with the sound of workers quietly swearing under their breath as they grapple hopelessly with Google 's latest Doodle : an interactive Rubik 's Cube .
- It was little known until 1980 when it got a global release .
- Indonesian Fakhri Raihaan solved a Rubik 's Cube with his feet in a record time of 27.93 seconds in 2012 .
